Line Series View source

The line series renders the given data as a line, constructed from an SVG path:

var line = fc.series.line()
    .xValue(function(d) { return d.x; })
    .yValue(function(d) { return d.y; })
    .xScale(xScale)
    .yScale(yScale);

container.append('g')
    .datum(data)
    .call(line);

Which gives the following:

This series has the same properties for specifying the x and y value accessors, and decorate as the point series.

The line series component also exposes the interpolate and tension properties from the D3 line shape that it uses for rendering. For more information about the interpolation modes refer to the official D3 Line Documentation.

The following example demonstrates how to render a step series via the step interpolation mode:

var line = fc.series.line()
    .interpolate('step')
    .xValue(function(d) { return d.x; })
    .yValue(function(d) { return d.y; })
    .xScale(xScale)
    .yScale(yScale);

container.append('g')
    .datum(data)
    .call(line);

Which gives the following:
